name: @camunda8/sap-btp-integration
description: mono repo for the Camunda BTP Integration, part of the SAP Integration

scripts.//_start:approuter: intended for local dev; the INCOMING_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT env var is set at deploy-time in mta.yaml
scripts._start:approuter: cross-env INCOMING_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT=900000 XS_APP_LOG_LEVEL=debug npm run start:local -w router
scripts.//_start:app: intended for local dev - this also starts the CAP layer!
scripts._start:app:noauth: npm run -w core _deploy:sqlite; npm run start:local -w fiori-app
scripts._start:app: npm run _deploy:sqlite -w core ; npm run build -w fiori-app; npm run start -w fiori-app
scripts.//start:noauth: no authN and auth - make sure to also set 'authenticationMethod' to 'none' in xs-dev.json
scripts.//start-: authN and authZ against BTP xsuaa with the help of cds bind - this also builds the UI, so startup takes a while
